# Overview

in Assignment 3, storm events data for the year 1997 forms the focus of the tasks. The tasks involve data preparation through filtering renaming and merging for the data. Along with the 1997 storm events data, the inbuilt states data is utilized.


# Packages Installation 

install.packages("tidyverse")
install.packages("stringr")


# Packages Loading

library(tidyverse)
library(stringr)



# Steps

10 Steps are included in the task:

1. Storm Data Sorting

2. Data Filtration 1

3. Data Arranging 

4. Entry Case Change

5. Data Filtration 2

6. Column Padding and Merging

7. Column Name Case Change

8. State Data Incorporation

9. Data frames Merging 

10. Visualization
